data.author: SchmilK

changelog.release_notes: v1.21 - Font selection fix when first applying watchface

v 1.20 - Now preset color options are available to match those in the screenshot!  


HUGE thanks to ZYAL on reddit for showing me I was thinking way to hard!

V1.17 - More fixes for battery not redrawing after notification (now there is a very brief battery fill animation)
-Enabled a new option to choose font for time :)
v1.16 - FINALLY fixed redraw issue after notification
v1.14 - Fixed day of week abbreviation missing letters
v1.13 - **By request** Enable/Disable vibration when BT disconnected

v1.12 
- Centered bluetooth logo better
- Replaced duplicate @ logo with a Star logo
v1.11 - Fixed text loss after returning from notification.

The 4th in the Schmurbery series.

Includes 19 different bluetooth logos to fancy up your face

Customizable colors for
-Background Color
-Date
-Battery shadow
-Battery
-Bluetooth logo
-Bluetooth connected
-Bluetooth disconnected
-Time
-Time Shadow
-Step counter
-Body color

Please enjoy, more to come!

data.description:
The 4th in the Schmurbery series.

Includes 19 different bluetooth logos to fancy up your face

Customizable colors for
-Background Color
-Date
-Battery shadow
-Battery
-Bluetooth logo
-Bluetooth connected
-Bluetooth disconnected
-Time
-Time Shadow
-Step counter
-Body color

Switch fonts between my custom font and a blocky font
Change bluetooth logo from a choice of 19 options

Now includes custom themes to match the screen shots! 
Please enjoy, more to come!
data.title: Schmurbery Digital 04
